text: [Music]
my favorite city in the world
we're here on a 15 hour layover which
Deanna and I booked on purpose for one
reason and one reason only the food and
skincare whenever someone asked me what
my favorite cuisine is my answer is
always Korean not only because I lived
here for nearly two years but because
it's the healthiest and most plentiful
that I found on earth the massive food
binge of Seoul starts now so it is 5:30
a.m. we have just arrived in Seoul we
got a big pot of kimchi chigae and very
delicious
[Music]
kimchi chigae is a massive pot of sour
soup with kimchi and korean vegetables
always served boiling over fire which is
mad is this freezing cold outside and
and it's warming us up a lot have I
mentioned how spicy this dishes never
underestimate the heat of Korean food
Power Move meal number two we are headed
for some Korean in fact you cannot come
to Seoul without eating Korean BBQ if I
had to eat one meal for the rest of my
life it'd be this what is that what are
you getting here we got some some gifts
are with Korean pork always cut the meat
with scissors and let her grill until
you like it
this is a spiritual moment because we've
eaten Korean barbecue about a thousand
times but never in Korea all of that
food for just twenty four bucks for two
people that is a deal stomachs full we
did some exploring around Hongdae
Seoul's young and hip district and the
epicenter of the Korean fashion wave
these are so Koreans they don't even
have a land what do you see over there
if you have a layover in Seoul this is
the place to spend it the most Korean
thing you can possibly do photo booth
alright next step on the food binge is
street food South Korea definitely has
their own style of street food cooking
on i-20 so dope funky is a spicy rice
cake time like a big piece of rice and
chewy we also got some fish cakes called
bode and like oh dang how is it very
good so do you want more food oh my god
I don't see any more I'm so full but it
has been a great day in Seoul and now we
are off to LA see you later alligator
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
